# pointOfInterestCategory

**Instance Property**

The category of the place.

## Declaration

```swift
pointOfInterestCategory?: string;
```

## Place name and category

- **name**: The name of the place.
- **formattedAddress**: The address of the place, formatted using its conventions of its country or region.
- **areasOfInterest**: Common names of the area in which the place resides.
